field.name: Advise mother to keep her body clean, especially hands, and breasts to minimise infection. Advise mother how to keep genital area clean:
Keep genital area clean and dry
Change perineal pads every 4-6 hours during the first week, and twice daily thereafter
Avoid douching, insertion of herbal products and use of tampons
Use clean cotton underwear, and use loose fitting clothing
Wipe genitals from front to back (vulva to anus)
